page.title: 09FASHION IN CLATFORD
page.content: People's{fashions}vary according to their {life styles.}High fashions change with every season but children's fashions vary more slowly. Boys like to wear stonewashed blue jeans or zipped jeans or burgundy coloured trousers, into button down or collarless shirts.Trainers or half pointed{shoes}over luminous coloured socks complete the picture. Girls wear trousers or skirts.Jeans are popular and almost any length skirt from mini to full length are fashionable.Plain pastel colours are 'in'-frills and flowery frocks are'out'.T.shirts and white ankle socks are usual.Most schools have a {uniform}to try to standardise clothes. Ours is grey and red,but it is not strictly enforced.
